title: Quanzhou Urban Hotel with River Views near Kaiyuan Temple
description: In the heart of this vibrant port city, Crowne Plaza Quanzhou Riverview, an IHG Hotel, is a sleek, modern stay that offers an abundance of historically significant sites at its doorstep. This city is the start of the Maritime Silk Road and home to the Kaiyuan Temple - a Buddhist temple built during the Tang Dynasty and UNESCO World Heritage-listed. After a day of exploring, enjoy a revitalising treatment at the spa or savour an expertly-mixed cocktail at the Stargazing Lounge.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Quanzhou Riverview, an IHG Hotel
